attributes.action: child sex grooming change the law of sentence
attributes.additional_details:
Government must legislate and hand-over minimum life term (minimum 14-30 years) to the ones who ruin someone's life (A child's life) through sex-grooming.
Child Abusers, Sex Offenders and peadophiles must given atleast 14+ years in prison. Law must be changed as harder and tougher sentences would frighten offenders of the grave consequences.
